There's an offset problem here - in the first verse, Am goes with the "S" of "Savior" and D7 goes with the i. The chordpro would be: [Am]Sav-[D7]ior.

I am also seeing some divisions between verses in the HTML that are not labeled - but in the chrod pro, it shows up as one long verse.
Verses are not separated.

Where's {meta: performer Bobby Bare} from? I don't see that anywhere in the HTML. Since we are now using meta fields, why don't we stick closer to the HTML types - "{meta: composer Jack Clement}" - we don't know if Jack composed the song - only that he wrote it. So use "meta: writer" in these cases.

The verses are split weirdly in the chopro file  - the first verse has been split in two:

Here's the paste from the HTML, which does contain the right line breaks between verses.
C
Oh the sound of the thing is not a ring
     F           G7       C

       D7                  G7

        C

Of sweethearts that I never saw

In Newport Arkansas

The HTML is fucked up on this one - the D7 and G7 are rendering weird above a lyric: No more lonely nights of walking the floor


Unplug the Jukebox  
recorded by Billy Walker
written by Ken Holloway and Bruce Haynes

C          F                          C
Unplug the jukebox  I don't need it anymore
               D7                                G7
No more lonely nights of walking the floor
             F                             C
I've found a new love  that's worth living for
              G7               F          C
So unplug the jukebox  I don't need it anymore
 
               F                            C
I used to find comfort  from the bottle and friends
                      D7                      G7
When those good times ran out old misery came in
                F                            C
Two songs for a quarter  buys six minutes of pain
           G7          F               C
Then Jesus came in and chased my blues away
 
Repeat #1
 
           F                       C
Those neon lights are  just some memory
                   D7                           G7
And those swinging doors won't  be swinging for me
                 F                   C
No more cheating songs or  smoky old bars
            G7          F                C
Since Jesus came in and mended my broken heart
 
Repeat #1

                G7              F          C
Tag: Unplug the jukebox I don't need it anymore
